name: Void-X
description:
Void-x is an intense arcade shoot em up, with bullethell style bosses and a unique retro aesthetic.
Try to stay alive as you work your way through epic boss fights, gathering powerups, and keeping that combo going for a high score!

Features:
- Controller support.
- Ability to change touch and controller sensitivity.
- Autosave, gotta take a phone call or get off the bus, don't worry your current progress is saved.
- Game Center support for high scores and achievements.
- Super smooth gameplay at 120fps on supported devices.
